interpretation: The "woman gesturing NO" card represents the power of boundaries and the importance of saying no. This card suggests that it is time to assert your boundaries and stand up for what you believe in. It may be tempting to compromise your values or give in to the demands of others, but this card reminds you to stay true to yourself and your principles. You have the power to say no and protect your emotional and physical well-being. Trust your instincts and don't be afraid to set limits. Remember that saying no can be a form of self-care and can ultimately lead to greater respect and appreciation from those around you. Associated keywords include boundaries, assertiveness, self-care, respect, and empowerment.
